data.eml:eml: A systematic study of Peliococcus Borchsenius (Hemiptera: Coccoidea: Pseudococcidae), with descriptions of a new Palaearctic genus and four new species from Turkey

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kaydan, Mehmet Bora (2015): A systematic study of Peliococcus Borchsenius (Hemiptera: Coccoidea: Pseudococcidae), with descriptions of a new Palaearctic genus and four new species from Turkey. Zootaxa 3920 (2): 201-248, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3920.2.1
